languages.text: "Хм. Почему я не удивлен тому, как быстро ты уш{mf|ел|ла} от темы".
"Huh. You abandoned that topic very quickly — why am I not surprised?"
languages.original_text: "Хм. Почему я не удивлен тому, как быстро ты уш{mf|ел|ла} от темы".

traits.locale_text: "Huh. You abandoned that topic very quickly — why am I not surprised?"

languages.text: «Vaya. Has abandonado muy rápidamente ese tema. ¿Por qué no me sorprende?».
languages.original_text: "Huh. You abandoned that topic very quickly — why am I not surprised?"

traits.locale_text: «Vaya. Has abandonado muy rápidamente ese tema. ¿Por qué no me sorprende?».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “呵，你这么快就放弃了这个话题，为什么我一点都不惊讶呢？”
languages.original_text: "Huh. You abandoned that topic very quickly — why am I not surprised?"

traits.locale_text: “呵，你这么快就放弃了这个话题，为什么我一点都不惊讶呢？”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「ふむ。話をあっという間に終わらせたな。なんで俺は驚いてないんだろうな？」
languages.original_text: "Huh. You abandoned that topic very quickly — why am I not surprised?"

traits.locale_text: 「ふむ。話をあっという間に終わらせたな。なんで俺は驚いてないんだろうな？」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Allons bon, vous lâchez prise bien rapidement... Comment se fait-il que je ne sois pas surpris ? »
languages.original_text: "Huh. You abandoned that topic very quickly — why am I not surprised?"

traits.locale_text: « Allons bon, vous lâchez prise bien rapidement... Comment se fait-il que je ne sois pas surpris ? »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Hm. Das Thema habt Ihr sehr schnell fallen lassen ... warum überrascht mich das nicht?"
languages.original_text: "Huh. You abandoned that topic very quickly — why am I not surprised?"

traits.locale_text: "Hm. Das Thema habt Ihr sehr schnell fallen lassen ... warum überrascht mich das nicht?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "Huh. You abandoned that topic very quickly — why am I not surprised?"

languages.text: "Hemen de konuyu değiştiriverdin, aaa... Niye şaşırmadım buna?"
